item.title: Untitled Mixtapes - HackBeanpot 2014
item.description: This weekend I participated in a 48 hour hackathon for Boston-area college students called HackBeanpot with Sanders Lauture and Zack Hickman. It was put on by some awesome people from Northeastern University who also do cool stuff like run NU ACM and NU Hacks. They like to make stuff and create events for people who like to make stuff, which is super cool. Mad props to them. It was a ton of fun, and was run extremely well. If youâ€™re a college student near Boston who makes stuff or wants to make stuff, you should definitely come next year.
